Title: Trane Technologies Schedules Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Conference Call
Summary: Trane Technologies plc (NYSE:TT), a global climate innovator, will host a conference call to discuss its second quarter 2025 financial results on Wednesday, July 30, 2025, at 10 a.m. ET. The company will issue its second quarter earnings release and earnings presentation in advance of the call; both will be available on the Trane Technologies website.

Title: Trane Technologies Recognized by TIME as One of the World’s Most Sustainable Companies
Summary: Trane Technologies (NYSE:TT), a global climate innovator, has been recognized in TIME’s list of the World’s Most Sustainable Companies, ranking 20th. The list, now in its second year and published in collaboration with market research company Statista, highlights the top 500 companies that embed sustainability into their core strategies.
